meanings.sent1: The pictorialized book had colorful illustrations on every page.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a pictorialized map of the city for the tourists.
meanings.sent3: The pictorialized movie poster made everyone excited to see the film.
meanings.sent4: Her words painted a pictorialized image of the peaceful countryside.
meanings.sent5: The pictorialized sunset in the painting was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: The pictorialized diagram helped students understand the complex concept.
